CustomField.description: If client is willing to be a referral for Premier Check box should be checked This field was created back in the “Build Team” days and was created by/for Premier, which is now HR Solutions / HR Services. Created so that they could record if a client would be interested in being a referral for the Premier service, back in 2009.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If client is willing to be a referral for Premier Check box should be checked
CustomField.label: Client willing to be Referral
